title: MG Flap Hats (02)-White W15S50F
features: Made from a water repellant micro fiber.
One Size with an adjustable draw cord, fits up to L.
Crown features 6 Panels, with an attached flap 7 1/2" long.
description: Planning your next camping trip or hiking adventure, make sure our white Brushed Sun Cap with Flap is on your checklist. Made from a unique water repellant micro fiber, this brushed cotton twill hat is ideal to take along on small outdoor excursions, offering all the protection of our much bigger caps, without all the unnecessary inch extras inch . Featuring a 6 paneled crown with breathable mesh lining and inner sweatband, to allow full ventilation and circulation of the head, this hat also boasts a 2 ? inch long precurved bill to provide your face with roomy shade and shield you from the sun. Attached in the back with an 7 ? inch long neck cap, and self adjusting elastic closure with toggle, you are sure to have the perfect fit and protection you require on your particular activity. Lightweight and easy to pack almost anywhere makes this hat the ideal vacation or trip hat. Simply pack it, stuff it, fold it or crush it, only to have it come out looking brand new every time. Guaranteed to be a hat that will not disappoint. Try one in any of our four amazing colors: Grey, Khaki, White and Navy. Made from a water repellant micro fiber. Pre Curved Bill measures 2 3/4 inch Long. One Size with String Closure fits up to L. Crown features 6 Panels, with an attached flap 7 ? inch long.
